description: Agent roster for Claude Code Harness. Agents are specialized sub-processes for delegated work.

builtin_agents.name: Explore
builtin_agents.description: Fast codebase exploration. Finds files, searches code, answers questions about codebase structure.
use_when: Looking for files without knowing exact location

builtin_agents.name: Plan
builtin_agents.description: Software architect agent. Designs implementation plans, identifies critical files, considers trade-offs.

builtin_agents.name: claude-code-guide
builtin_agents.description: Documentation expert for Claude Code, Agent SDK, and API. Answers questions about features, usage, configuration.
use_when: How to use hooks, commands, MCP servers

builtin_agents.name: general-purpose
builtin_agents.description: General agent for complex multi-step tasks. Has access to all tools.
use_when: When unsure which agent to use

builtin_agents.name: frontend-taste-architect
builtin_agents.description: Frontend design expert. Reviews UI/UX, evaluates designs, provides aesthetic guidance.

builtin_agents.name: blockchain-architect
builtin_agents.description: Blockchain and crypto expert. Smart contracts, security analysis, DeFi, ZK proofs.
